## OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder.OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilderOptions interface

Options for `OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilderOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [processLayersDefault](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilderoptions.processlayersdefault.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, all unspecified layers will be processed. If <code>false</code>, all unspecified layers will be ignored. |
|  [processLinesDefault](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilderoptions.processlinesdefault.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, all unspecified line features will be processed. If <code>false</code>, all unspecified line features will be ignored. |
|  [processPointsDefault](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilderoptions.processpointsdefault.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, all unspecified point features will be processed. If <code>false</code>, all unspecified point features will be ignored. |
|  [processPolygonsDefault](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilderoptions.processpolygonsdefault.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, all unspecified polygon features will be processed. If <code>false</code>, all unspecified polygon features will be ignored. |
